TIME THIS PDS WAS SHIPPED:   08/02/07    10:15:35    GMT-4:00

HX2PR.text:
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
*       HX2PR      -   ORIGINAL PROGRAM WAS BY BALDOMERO CASTILLA   *
*                  -   AUTHOR:   SAM GOLOB                          *
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
         GBLC  &LLEV
&LLEV    SETC  '006'
*
HX2PR CSECT
         YREGS
         USING *,R15
         B     EYECATCH
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
         DC    C'HX2PR - GENERAL QSAM COPY PGM   - '
         DC    C'&SYSDATE',C'  ',C'&SYSTIME ',C'--- '
         DC    C'LEVEL &LLEV '
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
SAVEAREA DC    18F'0'
EYECATCH DS    0H             ENSURE ALIGNMENT
         SAVE  (14,12)
         LR    R5,R1          SAVE PARM POINTER
         LA    R1,SAVEAREA          NEW SAVE-AREA ADDR
         ST    R1,8(,R13)           FORWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         ST    R13,4(,R1)           BACKWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         LR    R13,R1               NEW SAVE AREA ADDRESS
         DROP  R15
* -----                       SET UP TWO BASE REGISTERS
         USING HX2PR,R12,R11,R10
         LR    R12,R15
         LR    R11,R12
         LA    R11,4095(,R12)
         LA    R11,1(,R11)
         LA    R10,4095(,R11)
         LA    R10,1(,R10)
         LR    R1,R5          RESTORE PARM POINTER
         PRINT GEN
***********************************************************************
* GET SYSTEM DATE AND TIME                                            *
***********************************************************************
         STM   R14,R2,SAVE1402
         TIME  DEC,DATETIME,LINKAGE=SYSTEM,DATETYPE=MMDDYYYY
         OI    DATE+4,X'0F'
         UNPK  DATED,DATE
         OI    TIME+3,X'0F'
         UNPK  TIMED,TIME
*                          FILL HEADDATE AREA WITH INFO TO REUSE
         MVC   HEADDATE(2),DATED
         MVI   HEADDATE+2,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+3(2),DATED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+5,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+6(4),DATED+4
         MVC   HEADDATE+12(2),TIMED
         MVI   HEADDATE+14,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+15(2),TIMED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+17,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+18(2),TIMED+4
         MVC   HEADER+54(23),HEADDATE
         MVI   HEADER+38,C'-'
         MVC   HEADER+40(6),=C'LEVEL '
         MVC   HEADER+46(3),=C'&LLEV'
         LM    R14,R2,SAVE1402
***********************************************************************
         OPEN  (SYSPRINT,OUTPUT)
PRLMJFCB DS    0H                   PRELIMINARY READ JFCB TO DETERMINE
*                                   AVAILABLE DCB FIELD INFORMATION
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADER
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADERJ
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         OPEN  (SYSUT1,(INPUT))
         OPEN  (SYSUT2,(OUTPUT))
         RDJFCB SYSUT1
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'1'            SYSUT1
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         RDJFCB SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'2'            SYSUT2
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         TM    FLAG1,X'07'
         BZ    GO
         B     ABSTART
* -------
GO       DS    0H
         ZAP   INRCDS,=P'0'
         ZAP   OUTRCDS,=P'0'
LEER     GET   SYSUT1,AREA                MAIN PROCESSING LOOP
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         MVC   OUTPA1,AREA
         TR    OUTPA1,TRTBL1
         MVC   OUTPA2,AREA
         TR    OUTPA2,TRTBL2
         PUT   SYSUT2,OUTPA1
         PUT   SYSUT2,OUTPA2
         AP    OUTRCDS,=P'2'
         B     LEER
* -------
FIN      DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG01
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),INRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG02
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),OUTRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
* -------
THEEND   DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSPRINT
         L     R13,4(,R13)
         RETURN (14,12),RC=0
         EJECT
ABSTART  DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),ABENDMSG
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         B     THEEND
* -- BELOW ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *
*
PRTJFCB  DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(44),JFCBDSNM    DSNAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGMBR
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(8),JFCBELNM     MEMBER NAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGVOLSR           VOLSER
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(6),JFCBVOLS
         MVC   OUTLINE+26(6),JFCBVOLS+6
         MVC   OUTLINE+33(6),JFCBVOLS+12
         MVC   OUTLINE+40(6),JFCBVOLS+18
         MVC   OUTLINE+47(6),JFCBVOLS+24
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSORG          DSORG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'IS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'ISU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PSU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DA '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DAU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PO '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'POU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         OI    FLAG1,X'01'                FLAG DSORG MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'MISSING OR VSAM'
PUTDSRG  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
RECFM    DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGRECFM           RECFM
         LA    R4,OUTLINE+19
         TM    JFCRECFM,JFCUND
         BNO   NOTUND
         MVI   0(R4),C'U'
         OI    FLAG2,X'01'                FLAG RECFM=U
         A     R4,ONE
         B     CHKB
NOTUND   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCFIX
         BNO   NOTFIX
         MVI   0(R4),C'F'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTFIX   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCVAR
         BNO   CHKB
         MVI   0(R4),C'V'
         A     R4,ONE
CHKB     TM    JFCRECFM,JFCRFB
         BNO   NOTBLK
         MVI   0(R4),C'B'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTBLK   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCRFS
         BNO   NOTSCN
         MVI   0(R4),C'S'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTSCN   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCASA
         BNO   NOTASA
         MVI   0(R4),C'A'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTASA   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCMAC
         BNO   PUTRCFM
         MVI   0(R4),C'M'
PUTRCFM  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
LRECL    DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGLRECL
         SR    R4,R4
         LH    R4,JFCLRECL
         C     R4,=F'0'
         BNE   LRECPRT
         TM    FLAG2,X'01'                IS RECFM=U?
         BO    LRECPRT                    YES-0 IS LEGITIMATE
         OI    FLAG1,X'04'
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(7),=C'MISSING'
         B     LRECPUT
LRECPRT  DS    0H
         CVD   R4,DECVALUE
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT       LRECL
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),DECVALUE+3
LRECPUT  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
BLKSIZE  MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGBLKSZ
         SR    R4,R4
         LH    R4,JFCBLKSI
         C     R4,=F'0'
         BNE   BLKSIZEG                   BLOCK SIZE IS GOOD
         OI    FLAG1,X'02'                FLAG BLKSIZE MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'ZERO OR MISSING'
         B     BLKSZPUT
BLKSIZEG CVD   R4,DECVALUE
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT       BLKSIZE
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),DECVALUE+3
BLKSZPUT PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         BR    R7
* -- ABOVE ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *
*
* ----- WORK AREA ------ *
FLAG1    DC    X'00'
*              X'01'          DSORG IS MISSING
FLAG2    DC    X'00'
* ----- CONSTANTS ------ *
ONE      DC    F'1'
DECVALUE DS    CL8
EDPAT    DC    X'402020206B2020206B202120'
         DC    C' '
BLANKS   DC    CL133' '
OUTLINE  DS    CL133
HEADER   DC    CL133'1  HX2PR - HEX TO PRINT COPY PROGRAM '
         DC    CL133' '
HEADERJ  DC    CL133'-   JFCB REPORT OF DATASET CHARACTERISTICS '
         DC    CL133' '
MSGDSN   DC    CL133'-     SYSUTX DSN ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGVOLSR DC    CL133'-        VOLSER  ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGMBR   DC    CL133'         MEMBER  ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGDSORG DC    CL133'         DSORG   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGBLKSZ DC    CL133'         BLKSIZE ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGLRECL DC    CL133'         LRECL   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGRECFM DC    CL133'         RECFM   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSG01    DC    CL133'-    RECORDS  IN ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSG02    DC    CL133'     RECORDS OUT ='
         DC    CL133' '
ABENDMSG DC    CL133'-   JFCB IS MISSING VALUES - CORRECT YOUR JCL '
         DC    CL133' '
INRCDS   DC    PL7'0'
OUTRCDS  DC    PL7'0'
         LTORG
SYSUT1   DCB   DDNAME=SYSUT1,MACRF=GM,EODAD=FIN,DSORG=PS,EXLST=JFCB1,  X
               LRECL=80
SYSUT2   DCB   DDNAME=SYSUT2,MACRF=PM,DSORG=PS,EXLST=JFCB1,LRECL=80
SYSPRINT DCB   DDNAME=SYSPRINT,DSORG=PS,MACRF=PM,LRECL=133,RECFM=FBA
         DC    CL8' '
SAVE1402 DS    6F                 ONE MORE FOR SAFETY
TIMED    DS    CL7
DATED    DS    CL9
DATETIME DS    4F
         ORG   DATETIME
TIME     DS    CL4
         DS    CL4
DATE     DS    CL5
         DS    CL3
HEADDATE DC    CL23' '
         DC    CL8' '
         DS    0F
JFCB1    DC    X'87'
         DC    AL3(INFMJFCB)
         IEFJFCBN LIST=YES
TRTBL1   DS    0D                                                        05508
         DC    XL16'F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0'                    05509
         DC    XL16'F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1F1'                    05510
         DC    XL16'F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2F2'                    05511
         DC    XL16'F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3F3'                    05512
         DC    XL16'F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4F4'                    05513
         DC    XL16'F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5F5'                    05514
         DC    XL16'F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6F6'                    05515
         DC    XL16'F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7'                    05516
         DC    XL16'F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8F8'                    05517
         DC    XL16'F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9F9'                    05518
         DC    XL16'C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1C1'                    05519
         DC    XL16'C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2C2'                    05520
         DC    XL16'C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3C3'                    05521
         DC    XL16'C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4C4'                    05522
         DC    XL16'C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5C5'                    05523
         DC    XL16'C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6C6'                    05524
TRTBL2   DS    0D                                                        05525
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05526
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05527
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05528
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05529
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05530
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05531
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05532
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05533
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05534
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05535
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05536
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05537
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05538
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05539
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05540
         DC    XL16'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'                    05541
         EJECT                                                           05593
AREA     DS    CL80
OUTPA1   DS    CL80
OUTPA2   DS    CL80
         END   HX2PR

HX2PR4.text:
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
*       HX2PR4     -   ORIGINAL PROGRAM WAS BY BALDOMERO CASTILLA   *
*                  -   AUTHOR:   SAM GOLOB                          *
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
         GBLC  &LLEV
&LLEV    SETC  '006'
*
HX2PR4   CSECT
         YREGS
         USING *,R15
         B     EYECATCH
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
         DC    C'HX2PR4 - GENERAL QSAM COPY PGM   - '
         DC    C'&SYSDATE',C'  ',C'&SYSTIME ',C'--- '
         DC    C'LEVEL &LLEV '
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
SAVEAREA DC    18F'0'
EYECATCH DS    0H             ENSURE ALIGNMENT
         SAVE  (14,12)
         LR    R5,R1          SAVE PARM POINTER
         LA    R1,SAVEAREA          NEW SAVE-AREA ADDR
         ST    R1,8(,R13)           FORWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         ST    R13,4(,R1)           BACKWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         LR    R13,R1               NEW SAVE AREA ADDRESS
         DROP  R15
* -----                       SET UP TWO BASE REGISTERS
         USING HX2PR4,R12,R11,R10
         LR    R12,R15
         LR    R11,R12
         LA    R11,4095(,R12)
         LA    R11,1(,R11)
         LA    R10,4095(,R11)
         LA    R10,1(,R10)
         LR    R1,R5          RESTORE PARM POINTER
         PRINT GEN
***********************************************************************
* GET SYSTEM DATE AND TIME                                            *
***********************************************************************
         STM   R14,R2,SAVE1402
         TIME  DEC,DATETIME,LINKAGE=SYSTEM,DATETYPE=MMDDYYYY
         OI    DATE+4,X'0F'
         UNPK  DATED,DATE
         OI    TIME+3,X'0F'
         UNPK  TIMED,TIME
*                          FILL HEADDATE AREA WITH INFO TO REUSE
         MVC   HEADDATE(2),DATED
         MVI   HEADDATE+2,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+3(2),DATED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+5,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+6(4),DATED+4
         MVC   HEADDATE+12(2),TIMED
         MVI   HEADDATE+14,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+15(2),TIMED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+17,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+18(2),TIMED+4
         MVC   HEADER+54(23),HEADDATE
         MVI   HEADER+38,C'-'
         MVC   HEADER+40(6),=C'LEVEL '
         MVC   HEADER+46(3),=C'&LLEV'
         LM    R14,R2,SAVE1402
***********************************************************************
         OPEN  (SYSPRINT,OUTPUT)
PRLMJFCB DS    0H                   PRELIMINARY READ JFCB TO DETERMINE
*                                   AVAILABLE DCB FIELD INFORMATION
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADER
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADERJ
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         OPEN  (SYSUT1,(INPUT))
         OPEN  (SYSUT2,(OUTPUT))
         RDJFCB SYSUT1
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'1'            SYSUT1
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         RDJFCB SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'2'            SYSUT2
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         TM    FLAG1,X'07'
         BZ    GO
         B     ABSTART
* -------
GO       DS    0H
         ZAP   INRCDS,=P'0'
         ZAP   OUTRCDS,=P'0'
LEER     GET   SYSUT1,AREA                MAIN PROCESSING LOOP
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         MVC   OUTPA1,AREA
         TR    OUTPA1,TRTBL1
         MVC   OUTPA2,AREA
         TR    OUTPA2,TRTBL2
         MVC   EBCPRA,AREA
         TR    EBCPRA,TRTPREBC
         PUT   SYSUT2,EBCPRA
         PUT   SYSUT2,RULERHEX
         PUT   SYSUT2,OUTPA1
         PUT   SYSUT2,OUTPA2
         AP    OUTRCDS,=P'4'
         B     LEER
* -------
FIN      DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG01
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),INRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG02
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),OUTRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
* -------
THEEND   DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSPRINT
         L     R13,4(,R13)
         RETURN (14,12),RC=0
         EJECT
ABSTART  DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),ABENDMSG
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         B     THEEND
* -- BELOW ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *
*
PRTJFCB  DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(44),JFCBDSNM    DSNAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGMBR
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(8),JFCBELNM     MEMBER NAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGVOLSR           VOLSER
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(6),JFCBVOLS
         MVC   OUTLINE+26(6),JFCBVOLS+6
         MVC   OUTLINE+33(6),JFCBVOLS+12
         MVC   OUTLINE+40(6),JFCBVOLS+18
         MVC   OUTLINE+47(6),JFCBVOLS+24
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSORG          DSORG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'IS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'ISU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PSU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DA '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DAU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PO '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'POU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         OI    FLAG1,X'01'                FLAG DSORG MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'MISSING OR VSAM'
PUTDSRG  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
RECFM    DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGRECFM           RECFM
         LA    R4,OUTLINE+19
         TM    JFCRECFM,JFCUND
         BNO   NOTUND

         OI    FLAG2,X'01'                FLAG RECFM=U
         A     R4,ONE
         B     CHKB
NOTUND   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCFIX
         BNO   NOTFIX
         MVI   0(R4),C'F'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTFIX   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCVAR
         BNO   CHKB
         MVI   0(R4),C'V'
         A     R4,ONE
CHKB     TM    JFCRECFM,JFCRFB

         SR    R4,R4

         LH    R4,JFCBLKSI
         C     R4,=F'0'
         BNE   BLKSIZEG                   BLOCK SIZE IS GOOD
         OI    FLAG1,X'02'                FLAG BLKSIZE MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'ZERO OR MISSING'
         B     BLKSZPUT
BLKSIZEG CVD   R4,DECVALUE
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT       BLKSIZE
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),DECVALUE+3
BLKSZPUT PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         BR    R7
* -- ABOVE ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *

rexx_OBJ2HEX:  /* We still need rexx in comment if read from SYSPROC */
/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

  Dataset:  KET2812.REXX(OBJ2HEX)
  Author:   KTomiak
  Contact:  "Kenneth Tomiak"<cbt_ken@KTomiak.biz>
  Syntax:   OBJ2HEX (input_ddname output_ddname)
  Overview: Reads any 80 byte record and wraps it in rexx code to
            reconstruct it back later.

=======================================================================

 History of Modifications
 ------------------------
  When     Who      What you did
  -------- -------- ---------------------------------------------------
  20070528 KTOMIAK  Original code.

=======================================================================

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */

  Parse Arg all_my_arguments
  Numeric Digits 12

rexx_Main_OBJ2HEX:
  return_code = rexx_Initialize()
  If (return_code = 0) then,
    Do
      return_code = rexx_Process()
      return_code = rexx_Termination()
    End
  Return 0

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 In this routine we open any files and initialize any
 constants we might need.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
rexx_Initialize:
  PARSE VERSION,
    rexx_version,
    rexx_date
  PARSE SOURCE,
    source_host_env,
    source_call_type,
    source_uc_exec_name,
    source_hostdd,
    source_hostdsn,
    source_nf_exec_name,
    source_initial_cmd_env,
    source_asid_name,
    source_char8_user_token,
    source_hostother
  job_specs = rexx_jobspecs()
  sysvar_sysuid = SYSVAR("SYSUID")
  sysvar_sysenv = SYSVAR("SYSENV")
  say ""
  say Copies("=",55)
  say left("=" job_specs,53) "="
  say left("=" source_uc_exec_name,
    "executing under" source_host_env,
    "as a" source_call_type,53) "="
  say left("=  on" date() "at" time()".",53) "="
  say Copies("=",55)
  say ""
  return_code = 0

  If (source_host_env >< "TSO") Then,
    Do
      Say "Wrong host environment" source_host_env
      return_code = 16
    End

  Parse var all_my_arguments dd_in dd_ot .
  if (datatype(dd_in) = "NUM") then,
    do
      say "Setting default input and output DDnames."
      dd_in = "OBJIN"
      dd_ot = "HEXOT"
    end
  if (datatype(dd_ot) = "NUM") then,
    do
      say "Setting default output DDname."
      dd_ot = "HEXOT"
    end
  if (dd_in = "") then,
    do
      say "Setting default input and output DDnames."
      dd_in = "OBJIN"
      dd_ot = "HEXOT"
    end
  if (dd_ot = "") then,
    do
      say "Setting default output DDname."
      dd_ot = "HEXOT"
    end

  say "//DDIN:"dd_in"."
  say "//DDOT:"dd_ot"."
  text_out.0 = 0
  call add_rexx_code

  text_in.0 = 0
  "EXECIO * DISKR" dd_in "(FINIS STEM TEXT_IN.)"
  read_rc = RC
  if (read_rc >< 0) then,
    Do
      say "Encountered problems reading //DD:"dd_in"."
      say "RC("read_rc") >< 0"
      return_code = read_rc
    end
  say "Read" text_in.0 "records."

  Return return_code

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 In this routine we do our processing.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
rexx_Process:
  if (text_in.0 = 0) then,
    do
      say "//DD:"dd_in "appears to be a null file."
      return_code = 4
      return 4
    end
  hex_text = 0
  do text_ix = 1 to text_in.0
    line_1 = ""
    line_2 = ""
    text_hex = c2x(text_in.text_ix)
    do while text_hex >< ""
      parse var text_hex hex_odd +1 hex_even +1 text_hex
      line_1 = line_1""hex_odd
      line_2 = line_2""hex_even
    end
    text_out.0 = out_text(line_1)
    text_out.0 = out_text(line_2)
    hex_text = hex_text + 2
  end
  Return return_code

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 In this routine we close files and finish up.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
rexx_Termination:
  text_out.0 = out_text("ENDDATA*/")
  text_out.0 = out_text("  ")
  "EXECIO * DISKW" dd_ot "(FINIS STEM TEXT_OUT.)"
  write_rc = RC
  if (write_rc >< 0) then,
    Do
      say "Encountered problems writing //DD:"dd_ot"."
      say "RC("write_rc") >< 0"
      return_code = write_rc
    end
  say "Wrote" hex_text   "records."
  say "Wrote" text_out.0 "records, including HEX2OBJ extractor."
  say "E-O-R"
  Return return_code

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 Place any of your subroutines and procedures below this.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
rexx_jobspecs:
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /* ADDRESSABILITY TO CVT FROM PSA                                */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  PTR2PSA = 0
  CVTPTR = STORAGE(D2X(PTR2PSA + 16),4)
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /* ADDRESSABILITY TO SMCA, THEN GET SMF SYSTEM ID                */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  CVTSMCA = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(CVTPTR)+197),3)
  SMFID = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(CVTSMCA)+16),4)
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /* GET JOBNAME, STEP, AND PROCEDURE                              */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  PSATOLD  = STORAGE(21C,4)                    /* POINTER TO TCB   */
  PTRTIOT  = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PSATOLD)+12),4)   /* POINTER TO TIOT  */
  JOBNAME  = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PTRTIOT)),8)
  STEPNAME = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PTRTIOT)+8),8)
  PROCNAME = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PTRTIOT)+16),8)
  Tcbjscbb = Storage(D2x(C2d(Psatold)+181),3)              /* jscb */
  jscbssib = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(tcbjscbb)+316),4)      /* Ptr to SSIB */
  ssibjbid = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(jscbssib)+12),8)    /* job identifier */
  Return JOBNAME SSIBJBID STEPNAME PROCNAME

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 Adds text to a stem variable
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
out_text:
  parse arg text_line
  text_next = text_out.0 + 1
  text_out.text_next = text_line
  return text_next

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 Adds the rexx code to convert the member back.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
add_rexx_code:
  sigl_record = sigl + 25
  rexx_code = "YES"
  process_data = "NO"
  DO WHILE rexx_code = "YES"
    SIGL_RECORD=SIGL_RECORD+1
    MY_DATA=SOURCELINE(SIGL_RECORD)
    IF (MY_DATA="ENDREXX*/") THEN,
      DO
        rexx_code="NO"
        LEAVE
      END
    IF (MY_DATA="/*BEGINREXX") THEN,
      DO
        SIGL_RECORD=SIGL_RECORD+1
        PROCESS_DATA="YES"
        ITERATE
      END
    IF (PROCESS_DATA="YES") THEN,
      DO
        text_out.0 = out_text(my_data)
      END
  END
  return

  say ""
  say Copies("=",55)
  say left("=" job_specs,53) "="

    "executing under" source_host_env,

  say left("=  on" date() "at" time()".",53) "="

  Parse var all_my_arguments dd_ot .

    end
  if (dd_ot = "") then,

  text_in.0 = 0

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
rexx_Process:
  if (text_in.0 = 0) then,
    do
      say source_uc_exec_name "is missing the data."
      return_code = 4
      return 4
    end
  do text_ix = 1 to text_in.0 by 2
    line_1 = ""
    text_1 = text_in.text_ix
    next_ix = text_ix + 1
    text_2 = text_in.next_ix
    do char_ix = 1 to length(text_1)
      char_1 = substr(text_1,char_ix,1)
      char_2 = substr(text_2,char_ix,1)
      line_1 = line_1""char_1""char_2
    end
    text_out.0 = out_text(x2c(line_1))
  end
  Return return_code

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 In this routine we close files and finish up.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
rexx_Termination:
  "EXECIO * DISKW" dd_ot "(FINIS STEM TEXT_OUT.)"
  write_rc = RC
  if (write_rc >< 0) then,
    Do
      say "Encountered problems writing //DD:"dd_ot"."
      say "RC("write_rc") >< 0"
      return_code = write_rc
    end
  say "Wrote" text_out.0 "records."
  Return return_code

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 Place any of your subroutines and procedures below this.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
rexx_jobspecs:
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /* ADDRESSABILITY TO CVT FROM PSA                                */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  PTR2PSA = 0
  CVTPTR = STORAGE(D2X(PTR2PSA + 16),4)
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /* ADDRESSABILITY TO SMCA, THEN GET SMF SYSTEM ID                */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  CVTSMCA = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(CVTPTR)+197),3)
  SMFID = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(CVTSMCA)+16),4)
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /* GET JOBNAME, STEP, AND PROCEDURE                              */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
  PSATOLD  = STORAGE(21C,4)                    /* POINTER TO TCB   */
  PTRTIOT  = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PSATOLD)+12),4)   /* POINTER TO TIOT  */
  JOBNAME  = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PTRTIOT)),8)
  STEPNAME = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PTRTIOT)+8),8)
  PROCNAME = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(PTRTIOT)+16),8)
  Tcbjscbb = Storage(D2x(C2d(Psatold)+181),3)              /* jscb */
  jscbssib = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(tcbjscbb)+316),4)      /* Ptr to SSIB */
  ssibjbid = STORAGE(D2X(C2D(jscbssib)+12),8)    /* job identifier */
  Return JOBNAME SSIBJBID STEPNAME PROCNAME

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 Adds text to a stem variable
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
in_text:
  parse arg text_line
  text_next = text_in.0 + 1
  text_in.text_next = text_line
  return text_next

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 Adds text to a stem variable
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
out_text:
  parse arg text_line
  text_next = text_out.0 + 1
  text_out.text_next = text_line
  return text_next

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
 Adds the rexx code to convert the member back.
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
add_rexx_code:
  sigl_record = sigl + 25
  rexx_code = "YES"
  process_data = "NO"
  DO WHILE rexx_code = "YES"
    SIGL_RECORD=SIGL_RECORD+1
    MY_DATA=SOURCELINE(SIGL_RECORD)
    IF (MY_DATA="ENDDATA*/") THEN,
      DO
        rexx_code="NO"
        LEAVE
      END
    IF (MY_DATA="/*BEGINDATA") THEN,
      DO
        PROCESS_DATA="YES"
        ITERATE
      END
    IF (PROCESS_DATA="YES") THEN,
      DO
        text_in.0 = in_text(my_data)
      END
  END
  return

/* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
=======================================================================
__DATA__
=======================================================================
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< */
/*BEGINDATA
ENDREXX*/

PR2HX.text:
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
*       PR2HX      -   ORIGINAL PROGRAM WAS BY BALDOMERO CASTILLA   *
*                  -   AUTHOR:   SAM GOLOB                          *
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
         GBLC  &LLEV
&LLEV    SETC  '006'
*
PR2HX CSECT
         YREGS
         USING *,R15
         B     EYECATCH
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
         DC    C'PR2HX - GENERAL QSAM COPY PGM   - '
         DC    C'&SYSDATE',C'  ',C'&SYSTIME ',C'--- '
         DC    C'LEVEL &LLEV '
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
SAVEAREA DC    18F'0'
EYECATCH DS    0H             ENSURE ALIGNMENT
         SAVE  (14,12)
         LR    R5,R1          SAVE PARM POINTER
         LA    R1,SAVEAREA          NEW SAVE-AREA ADDR
         ST    R1,8(,R13)           FORWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         ST    R13,4(,R1)           BACKWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         LR    R13,R1               NEW SAVE AREA ADDRESS
         DROP  R15
* -----                       SET UP TWO BASE REGISTERS
         USING PR2HX,R12,R11,R10
         LR    R12,R15
         LR    R11,R12
         LA    R11,4095(,R12)
         LA    R11,1(,R11)
         LA    R10,4095(,R11)
         LA    R10,1(,R10)
         LR    R1,R5          RESTORE PARM POINTER
         PRINT GEN
***********************************************************************
* GET SYSTEM DATE AND TIME                                            *
***********************************************************************
         STM   R14,R2,SAVE1402
         TIME  DEC,DATETIME,LINKAGE=SYSTEM,DATETYPE=MMDDYYYY
         OI    DATE+4,X'0F'
         UNPK  DATED,DATE
         OI    TIME+3,X'0F'
         UNPK  TIMED,TIME
*                          FILL HEADDATE AREA WITH INFO TO REUSE
         MVC   HEADDATE(2),DATED
         MVI   HEADDATE+2,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+3(2),DATED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+5,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+6(4),DATED+4
         MVC   HEADDATE+12(2),TIMED
         MVI   HEADDATE+14,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+15(2),TIMED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+17,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+18(2),TIMED+4
         MVC   HEADER+54(23),HEADDATE
         MVI   HEADER+38,C'-'
         MVC   HEADER+40(6),=C'LEVEL '
         MVC   HEADER+46(3),=C'&LLEV'
         LM    R14,R2,SAVE1402
***********************************************************************
         OPEN  (SYSPRINT,OUTPUT)
PRLMJFCB DS    0H                   PRELIMINARY READ JFCB TO DETERMINE
*                                   AVAILABLE DCB FIELD INFORMATION
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADER
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADERJ
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         OPEN  (SYSUT1,(INPUT))
         OPEN  (SYSUT2,(OUTPUT))
         RDJFCB SYSUT1
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'1'            SYSUT1
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         RDJFCB SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'2'            SYSUT2
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         TM    FLAG1,X'07'
         BZ    GO
         B     ABSTART
* -------
GO       DS    0H
         ZAP   INRCDS,=P'0'
         ZAP   OUTRCDS,=P'0'
LEER     GET   SYSUT1,INPA1               MAIN PROCESSING LOOP
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         GET   SYSUT1,INPA2
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         TR    INPA1,TRTBL1
         TR    INPA2,TRTBL2
         MVC   OUTAREA,INPA1
         OC    OUTAREA,INPA2
         PUT   SYSUT2,OUTAREA
         AP    OUTRCDS,=P'1'
         B     LEER
* -------
FIN      DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG01
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),INRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG02
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),OUTRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
* -------
THEEND   DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSPRINT
         L     R13,4(,R13)
         RETURN (14,12),RC=0
         EJECT
ABSTART  DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),ABENDMSG
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         B     THEEND
* -- BELOW ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *
*
PRTJFCB  DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(44),JFCBDSNM    DSNAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGMBR
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(8),JFCBELNM     MEMBER NAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGVOLSR           VOLSER
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(6),JFCBVOLS
         MVC   OUTLINE+26(6),JFCBVOLS+6
         MVC   OUTLINE+33(6),JFCBVOLS+12
         MVC   OUTLINE+40(6),JFCBVOLS+18
         MVC   OUTLINE+47(6),JFCBVOLS+24
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSORG          DSORG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'IS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'ISU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PSU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DA '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DAU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PO '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'POU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         OI    FLAG1,X'01'                FLAG DSORG MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'MISSING OR VSAM'
PUTDSRG  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
RECFM    DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGRECFM           RECFM
         LA    R4,OUTLINE+19
         TM    JFCRECFM,JFCUND
         BNO   NOTUND
         MVI   0(R4),C'U'
         OI    FLAG2,X'01'                FLAG RECFM=U
         A     R4,ONE
         B     CHKB
NOTUND   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCFIX
         BNO   NOTFIX
         MVI   0(R4),C'F'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTFIX   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCVAR
         BNO   CHKB
         MVI   0(R4),C'V'
         A     R4,ONE
CHKB     TM    JFCRECFM,JFCRFB
         BNO   NOTBLK
         MVI   0(R4),C'B'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTBLK   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCRFS
         BNO   NOTSCN
         MVI   0(R4),C'S'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTSCN   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCASA
         BNO   NOTASA
         MVI   0(R4),C'A'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTASA   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCMAC
         BNO   PUTRCFM
         MVI   0(R4),C'M'
PUTRCFM  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
LRECL    DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGLRECL
         SR    R4,R4
         LH    R4,JFCLRECL
         C     R4,=F'0'
         BNE   LRECPRT
         TM    FLAG2,X'01'                IS RECFM=U?
         BO    LRECPRT                    YES-0 IS LEGITIMATE
         OI    FLAG1,X'04'
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(7),=C'MISSING'
         B     LRECPUT
LRECPRT  DS    0H
         CVD   R4,DECVALUE
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT       LRECL
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),DECVALUE+3
LRECPUT  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
BLKSIZE  MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGBLKSZ
         SR    R4,R4
         LH    R4,JFCBLKSI
         C     R4,=F'0'
         BNE   BLKSIZEG                   BLOCK SIZE IS GOOD
         OI    FLAG1,X'02'                FLAG BLKSIZE MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'ZERO OR MISSING'
         B     BLKSZPUT
BLKSIZEG CVD   R4,DECVALUE
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT       BLKSIZE
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),DECVALUE+3
BLKSZPUT PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         BR    R7
* -- ABOVE ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *
*
* ----- WORK AREA ------ *
FLAG1    DC    X'00'
*              X'01'          DSORG IS MISSING
FLAG2    DC    X'00'
* ----- CONSTANTS ------ *
ONE      DC    F'1'
DECVALUE DS    CL8
EDPAT    DC    X'402020206B2020206B202120'
         DC    C' '
BLANKS   DC    CL133' '
OUTLINE  DS    CL133
HEADER   DC    CL133'1  PR2HX - PRINT TO HEX COPY PROGRAM '
         DC    CL133' '
HEADERJ  DC    CL133'-   JFCB REPORT OF DATASET CHARACTERISTICS '
         DC    CL133' '
MSGDSN   DC    CL133'-     SYSUTX DSN ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGVOLSR DC    CL133'-        VOLSER  ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGMBR   DC    CL133'         MEMBER  ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGDSORG DC    CL133'         DSORG   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGBLKSZ DC    CL133'         BLKSIZE ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGLRECL DC    CL133'         LRECL   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGRECFM DC    CL133'         RECFM   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSG01    DC    CL133'-    RECORDS  IN ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSG02    DC    CL133'     RECORDS OUT ='
         DC    CL133' '
ABENDMSG DC    CL133'-   JFCB IS MISSING VALUES - CORRECT YOUR JCL '
         DC    CL133' '
INRCDS   DC    PL7'0'
OUTRCDS  DC    PL7'0'
         LTORG
SYSUT1   DCB   DDNAME=SYSUT1,MACRF=GM,EODAD=FIN,DSORG=PS,EXLST=JFCB1,  X
               LRECL=80
SYSUT2   DCB   DDNAME=SYSUT2,MACRF=PM,DSORG=PS,EXLST=JFCB1,LRECL=80
SYSPRINT DCB   DDNAME=SYSPRINT,DSORG=PS,MACRF=PM,LRECL=133,RECFM=FBA
         DC    CL8' '
SAVE1402 DS    6F                 ONE MORE FOR SAFETY
TIMED    DS    CL7
DATED    DS    CL9
DATETIME DS    4F
         ORG   DATETIME
TIME     DS    CL4
         DS    CL4
DATE     DS    CL5
         DS    CL3
HEADDATE DC    CL23' '
         DC    CL8' '
         DS    0F
JFCB1    DC    X'87'
         DC    AL3(INFMJFCB)
         IEFJFCBN LIST=YES
*   TRANSLATE TABLES TO GO FROM PRINTABLE TO HEX
*       FIRST LINE
TRTBL1   DS    0D                                                        05508
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   0                05509
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   1                05510
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   2                05511
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   3                05512
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   4                05513
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   5                05514
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   6                05515
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   7                05516
         DC    XL16'00A0B0C0D0E0F0000000000000000000'   8                05517
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   9                05518
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   A                05519
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   B                05520
         DC    XL16'00A0B0C0D0E0F0000000000000000000'   C                05521
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   D                05522
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   E                05523
         DC    XL16'00102030405060708090000000000000'   F                05524
*       SECOND LINE
TRTBL2   DS    0D                                                        05525
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   0                05526
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   1                05527
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   2                05528
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   3                05529
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   4                05530
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   5                05531
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   6                05532
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   7                05533
         DC    XL16'000A0B0C0D0E0F000000000000000000'   8                05534
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   9                05535
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   A                05536
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   B                05537
         DC    XL16'000A0B0C0D0E0F000000000000000000'   C                05538
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   D                05539
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   E                05540
         DC    XL16'00010203040506070809000000000000'   F                05541
*
OUTAREA  DS    CL80
INPA1    DS    CL80
INPA2    DS    CL80
         END   PR2HX

PR42HX.text:
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
*       PR42HX     -   ORIGINAL PROGRAM WAS BY BALDOMERO CASTILLA   *
*                  -   AUTHOR:   SAM GOLOB                          *
* ----------------------------------------------------------------- *
         GBLC  &LLEV
&LLEV    SETC  '006'
*
PR42HX CSECT
         YREGS
         USING *,R15
         B     EYECATCH
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
         DC    C'PR42HX - GENERAL QSAM COPY PGM   - '
         DC    C'&SYSDATE',C'  ',C'&SYSTIME ',C'--- '
         DC    C'LEVEL &LLEV '
         DC    C'--- '            MAKE EYECATCHER VISIBLE
SAVEAREA DC    18F'0'
EYECATCH DS    0H             ENSURE ALIGNMENT
         SAVE  (14,12)
         LR    R5,R1          SAVE PARM POINTER
         LA    R1,SAVEAREA          NEW SAVE-AREA ADDR
         ST    R1,8(,R13)           FORWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         ST    R13,4(,R1)           BACKWARD SAVE-AREA CHAIN PTR
         LR    R13,R1               NEW SAVE AREA ADDRESS
         DROP  R15
* -----                       SET UP TWO BASE REGISTERS
         USING PR42HX,R12,R11,R10
         LR    R12,R15
         LR    R11,R12
         LA    R11,4095(,R12)
         LA    R11,1(,R11)
         LA    R10,4095(,R11)
         LA    R10,1(,R10)
         LR    R1,R5          RESTORE PARM POINTER
         PRINT GEN
***********************************************************************
* GET SYSTEM DATE AND TIME                                            *
***********************************************************************
         STM   R14,R2,SAVE1402
         TIME  DEC,DATETIME,LINKAGE=SYSTEM,DATETYPE=MMDDYYYY
         OI    DATE+4,X'0F'
         UNPK  DATED,DATE
         OI    TIME+3,X'0F'
         UNPK  TIMED,TIME
*                          FILL HEADDATE AREA WITH INFO TO REUSE
         MVC   HEADDATE(2),DATED
         MVI   HEADDATE+2,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+3(2),DATED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+5,C'/'
         MVC   HEADDATE+6(4),DATED+4
         MVC   HEADDATE+12(2),TIMED
         MVI   HEADDATE+14,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+15(2),TIMED+2
         MVI   HEADDATE+17,C':'
         MVC   HEADDATE+18(2),TIMED+4
         MVC   HEADER+54(23),HEADDATE
         MVI   HEADER+38,C'-'
         MVC   HEADER+40(6),=C'LEVEL '
         MVC   HEADER+46(3),=C'&LLEV'
         LM    R14,R2,SAVE1402
***********************************************************************
         OPEN  (SYSPRINT,OUTPUT)
PRLMJFCB DS    0H                   PRELIMINARY READ JFCB TO DETERMINE
*                                   AVAILABLE DCB FIELD INFORMATION
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADER
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),HEADERJ
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
* -------
         MVC   RULERIN(80),RULERHEX
         OPEN  (SYSUT1,(INPUT))
         OPEN  (SYSUT2,(OUTPUT))
         RDJFCB SYSUT1
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'1'            SYSUT1
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         RDJFCB SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSN
         MVI   OUTLINE+11,C'2'            SYSUT2
         BAL   R7,PRTJFCB
         TM    FLAG1,X'07'
         BZ    GO
         B     ABSTART
* -------
GO       DS    0H
         ZAP   INRCDS,=P'0'
         ZAP   OUTRCDS,=P'0'
LEER     DS    0H
         GET   SYSUT1,DSPLYIN
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         GET   SYSUT1,RULERIN
         CLC   RULERIN,RULERHEX
         BNE   SYNCHOUT
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         GET   SYSUT1,INPA1               MAIN PROCESSING LOOP
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         GET   SYSUT1,INPA2
         AP    INRCDS,=P'1'
         TR    INPA1,TRTBL1
         TR    INPA2,TRTBL2
         MVC   OUTAREA,INPA1
         OC    OUTAREA,INPA2
         PUT   SYSUT2,OUTAREA
         AP    OUTRCDS,=P'1'
         B     LEER
* -------
FIN      DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG01
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),INRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG02
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),OUTRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
EOJ0     DS    0H
         LA    R5,0                    Zero Return Code
         B     EOJ
EOJ4     DS    0H
         LA    R5,4                    RC = 4
         B     EOJ
EOJ8     DS    0H
         LA    R5,8                    RC = 8
         B     EOJ
EOJ12    DS    0H
         LA    R5,12                   RC = 12
         B     EOJ
EOJ16    DS    0H
         LA    R5,16                   RC = 16
         B     EOJ
EOJ      DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSPRINT
         L     R13,4(,R13)
         LR    R15,R5              Load return code into R15.
         ST    R15,16(,R13)        Put RC into passed save area.
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)
         BR    R14                 Go back to system.
         SPACE
* -------
ABSTART  DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),ABENDMSG
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         B     EOJ0
* -------
SYNCHOUT DS    0H
         CLOSE SYSUT1
         CLOSE SYSUT2
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),SYNCHMSG
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG01
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),INRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE(133),MSG02
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),OUTRCDS+2
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         B     EOJ8
* -- BELOW ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *
*
PRTJFCB  DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(44),JFCBDSNM    DSNAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGMBR
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(8),JFCBELNM     MEMBER NAME
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGVOLSR           VOLSER
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(6),JFCBVOLS
         MVC   OUTLINE+26(6),JFCBVOLS+6
         MVC   OUTLINE+33(6),JFCBVOLS+12
         MVC   OUTLINE+40(6),JFCBVOLS+18
         MVC   OUTLINE+47(6),JFCBVOLS+24
         PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGDSORG          DSORG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'IS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'ISU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGIS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PS '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PSU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPS+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DA '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'DAU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGDA+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'PO '
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO
         BE    PUTDSRG
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(3),=C'POU'
         CLI   JFCDSRG1,JFCORGPO+JFCORGU
         BE    PUTDSRG
         OI    FLAG1,X'01'                FLAG DSORG MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'MISSING OR VSAM'
PUTDSRG  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
RECFM    DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGRECFM           RECFM
         LA    R4,OUTLINE+19
         TM    JFCRECFM,JFCUND
         BNO   NOTUND
         MVI   0(R4),C'U'
         OI    FLAG2,X'01'                FLAG RECFM=U
         A     R4,ONE
         B     CHKB
NOTUND   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCFIX
         BNO   NOTFIX
         MVI   0(R4),C'F'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTFIX   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCVAR
         BNO   CHKB
         MVI   0(R4),C'V'
         A     R4,ONE
CHKB     TM    JFCRECFM,JFCRFB
         BNO   NOTBLK
         MVI   0(R4),C'B'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTBLK   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCRFS
         BNO   NOTSCN
         MVI   0(R4),C'S'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTSCN   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCASA
         BNO   NOTASA
         MVI   0(R4),C'A'
         A     R4,ONE
NOTASA   TM    JFCRECFM,JFCMAC
         BNO   PUTRCFM
         MVI   0(R4),C'M'
PUTRCFM  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
LRECL    DS    0H
         MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGLRECL
         SR    R4,R4
         LH    R4,JFCLRECL
         C     R4,=F'0'
         BNE   LRECPRT
         TM    FLAG2,X'01'                IS RECFM=U?
         BO    LRECPRT                    YES-0 IS LEGITIMATE
         OI    FLAG1,X'04'
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(7),=C'MISSING'
         B     LRECPUT
LRECPRT  DS    0H
         CVD   R4,DECVALUE
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT       LRECL
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),DECVALUE+3
LRECPUT  PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
BLKSIZE  MVC   OUTLINE,OUTLINE-1
         MVC   OUTLINE,MSGBLKSZ
         SR    R4,R4
         LH    R4,JFCBLKSI
         C     R4,=F'0'
         BNE   BLKSIZEG                   BLOCK SIZE IS GOOD
         OI    FLAG1,X'02'                FLAG BLKSIZE MISSING
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(15),=C'ZERO OR MISSING'
         B     BLKSZPUT
BLKSIZEG CVD   R4,DECVALUE
         MVC   OUTLINE+19(12),EDPAT       BLKSIZE
         ED    OUTLINE+19(12),DECVALUE+3
BLKSZPUT PUT   SYSPRINT,OUTLINE
         BR    R7
* -- ABOVE ---------------  SUBROUTINE TO PRINT JFCB INFORMATION ---- *
*
* ----- WORK AREA ------ *
FLAG1    DC    X'00'
*              X'01'          DSORG IS MISSING
FLAG2    DC    X'00'
* ----- CONSTANTS ------ *
ONE      DC    F'1'
DECVALUE DS    CL8
EDPAT    DC    X'402020206B2020206B202120'
         DC    C' '
BLANKS   DC    CL133' '
OUTLINE  DS    CL133
HEADER   DC    CL133'1  PR42HX - PRINT TO HEX COPY PROGRAM '
         DC    CL133' '
HEADERJ  DC    CL133'-   JFCB REPORT OF DATASET CHARACTERISTICS '
         DC    CL133' '
MSGDSN   DC    CL133'-     SYSUTX DSN ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGVOLSR DC    CL133'-        VOLSER  ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGMBR   DC    CL133'         MEMBER  ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGDSORG DC    CL133'         DSORG   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGBLKSZ DC    CL133'         BLKSIZE ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGLRECL DC    CL133'         LRECL   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSGRECFM DC    CL133'         RECFM   ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSG01    DC    CL133'-    RECORDS  IN ='
         DC    CL133' '
MSG02    DC    CL133'     RECORDS OUT ='
         DC    CL133' '
ABENDMSG DC    CL133'-   JFCB IS MISSING VALUES - CORRECT YOUR JCL '
SYNCHMSG DC    CL133'-   RULER RECORD IS OUT OF SYNCH - CHECK INPUT'
         DC    CL133' '
INRCDS   DC    PL7'0'
OUTRCDS  DC    PL7'0'
         LTORG
SYSUT1   DCB   DDNAME=SYSUT1,MACRF=GM,EODAD=FIN,DSORG=PS,EXLST=JFCB1,  X
               LRECL=80
SYSUT2   DCB   DDNAME=SYSUT2,MACRF=PM,DSORG=PS,EXLST=JFCB1,LRECL=80
SYSPRINT DCB   DDNAME=SYSPRINT,DSORG=PS,MACRF=PM,LRECL=133,RECFM=FBA
         DC    CL8' '
SAVE1402 DS    6F                 ONE MORE FOR SAFETY
TIMED    DS    CL7
DATED    DS    CL9
DATETIME DS    4F
         ORG   DATETIME
TIME     DS    CL4
         DS    CL4
DATE     DS    CL5
         DS    CL3
HEADDATE DC    CL23' '
         DC    CL8' '
         DS    0F
JFCB1    DC    X'87'
         DC    AL3(INFMJFCB)
         IEFJFCBN LIST=YES
*   TRANSLATE TABLES TO GO FROM PRINTABLE TO HEX
*       FIRST LINE
TRTBL1   DS    0D                                                        05508
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   0                05509
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   1                05510
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   2                05511
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   3                05512
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   4                05513
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   5                05514
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   6                05515
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   7                05516
         DC    XL16'00A0B0C0D0E0F0000000000000000000'   8                05517
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   9                05518
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   A                05519
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   B                05520
         DC    XL16'00A0B0C0D0E0F0000000000000000000'   C                05521
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   D                05522
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   E                05523
         DC    XL16'00102030405060708090000000000000'   F                05524
*       SECOND LINE
TRTBL2   DS    0D                                                        05525
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   0                05526
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   1                05527
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   2                05528
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   3                05529
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   4                05530
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   5                05531
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   6                05532
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   7                05533
         DC    XL16'000A0B0C0D0E0F000000000000000000'   8                05534
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   9                05535
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   A                05536
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   B                05537
         DC    XL16'000A0B0C0D0E0F000000000000000000'   C                05538
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   D                05539
         DC    XL16'00000000000000000000000000000000'   E                05540
         DC    XL16'00010203040506070809000000000000'   F                05541
*
RULERHEX DS    0CL132                                                    05255
         DC    C'----+----1----+----2----+----3----+----4----+----5--'   05256
         DC    C'--+----6----+----7----+----8----+----9----+----0----+'  05257
         DC    C'----1----+----2----+----3----+----4'                    05258
OUTAREA  DS    CL80
DSPLYIN  DS    CL80
RULERIN  DS    CL80
INPA1    DS    CL80
INPA2    DS    CL80
         END   PR42HX

./ ADD NAME=ACCVT
         MACRO
         ACCVT &DSECT=,&PREFIX=
ACCPFX   DSECT                    ACF2 CVT PREFIX AREA
ACCTLEN  DS    F'2096'            TOTAL LENGTH OF ACCVT
ACCPFXL  DS    F'48'              LENGTH OF PREFIX ONLY
ACCPID   EQU   *                  ACF2 SYSTEM IDENT AREA
ACCPIDL  DS    H                  LENGTH OF SYSID BUFFER
ACCPIDO  DS    H                  ZERO
ACCPIDS  DS    CL26'eTrust CA-ACF2 8.0 SP03' ACF2 Sys ID STRING  RS0407
         DS    XL6'00'                                           RS0407
ACCPFXP  DS    A(ACCPFX)          ADDR OF PREFIX
ACCVT    EQU   *
         DS    512F               UNUSED
         MEND
./ ADD NAME=ADYDFLM
         MACRO
         ADYDFLM
DFLM     DSECT                         DAE Default Module (ADYDFLT)
DFLID    DS    0CL4                    CB ID
DFLDFL   DS    CL3                     Acronym 'DFL'
DFLVSD   DS    C                       Version number
DFLPLMEM DS    CL8                     Last sys1.parmlib member        X
                                       successfully processed for a    X
                                       set DAE command
DFLCRIT  DS    0CL84                   Criteria for symptom string     X
                                       to be considered as a unique    X
                                       identifier by DAE
DFLSCNT  DS    XL2                     Minimum number of symptom       X
                                       keywords
DFLSLN   DS    XL2                     Minimum symptom string length
DFLREQ   DS    0CL40                   Keys of specific symptoms       X
                                       required for matching - each    X
                                       two bytes defines a key
DFLREQA  DS    20XL2                   Array containing one            X
                                       required key per entry
DFLOPT   DS    0CL40                   Optional keys for matching -    X
                                       each two bytes defines a key    X
                                       which is optional for matching
DFLOPTA  DS    20XL2                   Array containing one            X
                                       optional key per entry
DFLDSN   DS    CL44                    Name of the data set containing X
                                       the DAE problem records
DFLEXPIR DS    XL4                     Expiration period in days for   X
                                       records in the DAE dataset.     X
                                       If the date when DAE is started X
                                       is more than this period after  X
                                       the last occurrence date, then  X
                                       the record will be ignored.
DFLRECNO DS    F                       Maximum size to which the       X
                                       symptom queue will be allowed   X
                                       to grow.  RECORD(nn).           X
                                       This will be rounded up to a    X
                                       multiple of the cpool blksize.
DFLOFLAG DS    0CL8                    DAE option flags
DFLDAEO  DS    X                       Options for DAE keywords which  X
                                       do not have flags for the       X
                                       subparameters
DFLSTRT  EQU   X'80'                   START
DFLSTOP  EQU   X'40'                   STOP
DFLSHR   EQU   X'20'                   SHARED DAE data set
DFLDSNS  EQU   X'10'                   Dataset name specified
DFLGSTP  EQU   X'08'                   GLOBALSTOP specified
DFLSHRO  EQU   X'04'                   SHARED OPTIONS
DFLDOPT  DS    0CL2                    Dump options which are shared   X
                                       in the sysplex.
DFLSVC   DS    X                       Options for the
*                                      SVCDUMP keyword
DFLSVCM  EQU   X'80'                   SVCDUMP(MATCH)
DFLSVCS  EQU   X'40'                   SVCDUMP(SUPPRESS)
DFLSVCU  EQU   X'20'                   SVCDUMP(UPDATE)
DFLSVCA  EQU   X'10'                   SVCDUMP(SUPPRESSALL)
DFLSYSM  DS    X                       Options for the
*                                      SYSMDUMP keyword

./ ADD NAME=CICS
         MACRO
         CICS
*
** CICS: DFHSAB - CICS subsystem Anchor Block
** (Based on CICS 4.1)
*
SAB      DSECT ,
SABCDD   DS    F                          Addr of CEC 'inop' data
SABSCTE  DS    F                          Addr of SCTE
SAB_ID   DS    C'DFHSAB'                  Eyecatcher
         ORG   SAB+X'18'
SABMAPPT DS    F                          Addr of bit map: act CICS
         ORG   ,
SABL     EQU   32
*
** CICS: SCTE - Subsystem Control Table Extension
** (Based on CICS 4.1, Update 5.1, Update 6.2                    RS0904
*
SCTE     DSECT                                                   RS0904
SCTELACB DS    A                                                 RS0904
SCTECNT  DS    FL3                                               RS0904
SCTEMOD# DS    FL1                                               RS0904
SCTEMOD1 EQU   1              SCTE modification 1 - CICS/TS 2.2  RS0904
         DS    F              Reserved - must not be deleted     RS0904
SCTESVCI DS    H              INSTRUCTION TO INVOKE CICS SVC -   RS0904
SCTEVER# DS    AL1            SCTE version no.                   RS0904
SCTEVER1 EQU   1              SCTE version 1 - CICS 4.1          RS0904
SCTEVER2 EQU   2              SCTE version 2 - CICS 5.1          RS0904
SCTEVER3 EQU   3              SCTE version 3 - CICS/TS 2.2       RS0904
SCTEFLGS DS    B              Various flags                      RS0904
SCTEFSP4 EQU   X'80'          MVS includes XCF support (SP4 plus)RS0904
SCTEFXCF EQU   X'40'          XCF level satisfies all IRP's needsRS0904
SCTEL    EQU   *-SCTE         Length of SCTE entry               RS0904
*
** CICS: LCB - Logon Control Block
** (Based on CICS 4.1, updated for 5.3)
*
LCB      DSECT ,
         ORG   LCB+X'60'
LCBAPPLD53 DS  CL8' '
         ORG   ,
         ORG   LCB+X'7C'
LCBAPPLD41 DS  CL8' '
         ORG   ,
LCBLNGTH EQU   X'D8'
*
** CICS: LACB - Logon Address Space Control Block
** (Based on CICS 4.1, updated for 5.3)
*
LACB     DSECT ,
         ORG   LACB+X'08'                                        RS0400
LACBSUD2 DS    F               SUDB ptr for CICS 5.2/CTS 1.2     RS0400
LACBSUDB DS    F               SUDB ptr for CICS 4.1
LACBL    EQU   X'58'
*
LACBE    DSECT ,
LACBENM  DS    CL8
LACBELEN EQU   X'14'
*
** CICS: SUDB - SubSystem User Definition Control Block
** (Based on CICS 4.1)
*
SUDB     DSECT ,
SUDBCHN  DS    A
SUDBLACB DS    A
         ORG   SUDB+X'0E'
         DS    H
         DS    F
SUDBASCB DS    F
SUDBJSB  DS    F
SUDBAWS  DS    F
SUDBLCB  DS    F
         ORG   ,
SUDBLEN  EQU   X'58'
         MEND

***********************************************************************
* ASSEMBLER OUTPUT GENERATED BY PLASMAP TO ASSEMBLER CONVERSION       *

*        MANAGEMENT CLASS DEFINITION                                  *

         ORG   MCD+0

         DS    CL2                      UNUSED

MCDPTYP  DS    H                        TYPE OF ITEMS IN LIST
         DS    CL2                      RESERVED

MCDH_LENGTH EQU *-MCD                                              +RS
IGDMCDE  DSECT
MCDNMLEN DS    H                        LENGTH OF NAME
MCDNAME  DS    CL30                     NAME OF MANAGEMENT CLASS
MCDUSER  DS    CL8                      USERID OF LAST UPDATER
MCDDATE  DS    CL10                     DATE OF LAST UPDATE
         DS    CL6                      RESERVED
MCDTIME  DS    CL8                      TIME OF LAST UPDATE
MCDDESC  DS    CL120                    DESCRIPTION
MCDFLG1  DS    CL1                      FLAGS AND RESERVED
MCDRELE  EQU   B'11000000'              PARTIAL RELEASE CHOICES @P2A
MCDPREL  EQU   B'10000000'              DATA SET ELIGIBLE FOR PARTIAL  X
                                        RELEASE, 1=YES, 0=NO
MCDPRCN  EQU   B'01000000'              CONDITIONAL PARTIAL            X
                                        RELEASE @P2A
MCDSPEC  DS    CL2                      ATTRIBUTE SPECIFIED FLAGS  1=  X
                                        SPECIFIED, 0= NOT SPEC'D
MCDFBVER EQU   B'10000000'              WAS MCDBKVS SPECIFIED?
MCDFBVRD EQU   B'01000000'              WAS MCDBVRD SPECIFIED?
MCDFRBK  EQU   B'00100000'              WAS MCDBKDY SPECIFIED?
MCDFRNP  EQU   B'00010000'              WAS MCDBKNP SPECIFIED?
MCDFEXDT EQU   B'00001000'              WAS MCDEXDAT SPECIFIED?
MCDFEXDY EQU   B'00000100'              WAS MCDEXPDY SPECIFIED?
MCDFPRDY EQU   B'00000010'              WAS MCDPRDY SPECIFIED?
MCDFL1DY EQU   B'10000000'              WAS MCDL1DY SPECIFIED?
MCDFRLMG EQU   B'01000000'              WAS MCDRLOMG SPECIFIED?
MCDFPELE EQU   B'00100000'              WAS MCDPELEM SPECIFIED?
MCDFBKFQ EQU   B'00010000'              WAS MCDBKFQ SPECIFIED?
         DS    CL1                      RESERVED
***********************************************************************
*        DATA SET MIGRATION ATTRIBUTES -- NO MIGRATION IS ALLOWED IF  *
*        MCDCMAU = MCDMNONE  MCDPRDY IS VALID IF MCDFPRDY IS ON       *
*        MCDL1DY IS VALID IF MCDFL1DY IS ON AND MCDL1NOL IS OFF       *
*        VALUE IS NOLIMIT IF MCDL1NOL IS ON                           *
***********************************************************************
MCDMIGRT DS    CL2
MCDMIGF  DS    CL1                      DATA SET MIGRATION FLAGS
MCDL1NOL EQU   B'00100000'              MIN DAYS ON LEVEL 1/LAST USE,  X
                                        1=NOLIMIT, ELSE SEE MCDL1DY
         DS    CL1                      RESERVED
MCDPRDY  DS    H                        MIN DAYS ON PRIM / LAST USE
MCDL1DY  DS    H                        MIN DAYS ON LVL 1 / LAST USE
MCDCMAU  DS    AL1                      COMMAND OR AUTO MIGRATE SEE    X
                                        CONSTANTS BELOW
         DS    CL1                      RESERVED
***********************************************************************
*        GENERATION DATA GROUP ATTRIBUTES -- MCDRLOMG IS VALID IF     *
*        MCDFRLMG IS ON  MCDPELEM IS VALID IF MCDFPELE IS ON          *
***********************************************************************
MCDGDG   DS    CL4
MCDGDGFL DS    CL1                      GDG ATTRIBUTE FLAGS
MCDRLOMG EQU   B'10000000'              MIGRATE OR EXPIRE ROLLED OFF   X
                                        GDS, 1 = MIGRATE, 0 = EXPIRE
         DS    CL1                      RESERVED
MCDPELEM DS    H                        NUM GDG ELEMENTS ON PRIMARY
***********************************************************************
*        ACTION ON DATA SET EXPIRATION (RESERVED FOR FUTURE USE)      *
***********************************************************************
MCDEXPIR DS    CL4
         DS    CL4                      RESERVED
***********************************************************************
*        DATA SET RETENTION ATTRIBUTES -- MCDEXPDY IS VALID IF        *
*        MCDFEXDY IS ON AND MCDDYNOL IS OFF  VALUE IS NOLIMIT IF      *
*        MCDDYNOL IS ON  MCDEXDAT IS VALID IF MCDFEXDT IS ON AND      *
*        MCDDTNOL IS OFF  VALUE IS NOLIMIT IF MCDDTNOL IS ON  THIS    *
*        FIELD IS A NUMBER OF DAYS IF MCDRFMT = MCDFDAYS AND IS A     *
*        DATE IF MCDRFMT = MCDFDATE                                   *
***********************************************************************
MCDRETEN DS    CL12
MCDRETF  DS    CL1                      DATA SET RETENTION FLAGS
MCDDYNOL EQU   B'10000000'              1=EXPIRE AFTER DAYS= NOLIMIT   X
                                        ELSE 0 AND SEE MCDEXPDY
MCDDTNOL EQU   B'01000000'              1=EXPIRE AFTER DATE= NOLIMIT   X
                                        ELSE 0 AND SEE MCDEXDAT
MCDRFMT  DS    AL1                      FORMAT USED FOR MCDEXDAT DATE  X
                                        OR DAYS  SEE CONSTANTS
         DS    CL2                      RESERVED
MCDEXPDY DS    F                        EXPIRE AFTER DAYS NO USE
MCDEXDAT DS    F                        EXPIR  DAYS SINCE CREATE OR
MCDEYEAR DS    AL2                      EXPIRE DATE SINCE CREATE
MCDEDAY  DS    AL2                      SEE MCDRFMT TO FOR FORMAT
***********************************************************************
*        DATA SET BACKUP CRITERIA -- MCDBKFQ IS VALID IF MCDFBKFQ IS  *
*        ON  MCDBKVS IS VALID IF MCDFBVER IS ON  MCDBVRD IS VALID IF  *
*        MCBFBVRD IS ON                                           @P1C*
*        MCDBKDY IS VALID IF MCDFRBK IS ON AND MCDNPNOL IS OFF    @P1C*
*        VALUE IS NOLIMIT IF MCDNPNOL IS ON                       @P1C*
*        MCDBKNP IS VALID IF MCDFRNPR IS ON AND MCDRBNOL IS OFF   @P1C*
*        VALUE IS NOLIMIT IF MCDRBNOL IS ON                       @P1C*
*        AUTO BACKUP IS NOT ALLOWED IF MCDAUTBK IS OFF            @P1C*
*        NO COMMAND BACKUP IS ALLOWED IF MCDBADU = MCDBNONE       @P1C*
*        IF MCDBADU=MCDBBOTH BOTH ADMIN AND USER COMMAND              *
*        ALLOWED  IF MCDBADU=MCDBADM ONLY ADMIN COMMAND BACKUP IS     *
*        ALLOWED                                                      *
***********************************************************************
MCDBKUP  DS    CL24                     DATA SET BACKUP CRITERIA
         DS    CL1                      FLAGS AND RESERVED
MCDRBNOL EQU   B'10000000'              1=RETAIN DAYS ONLY BACKUP VER= X
                                        NOLIMIT  0=SEE MCDBKNP FOR     X
                                        DAYS TO RETAIN            @P1C
MCDNPNOL EQU   B'01000000'              1=RETAIN DAYS EXTRA BACKUP     X
                                        VERSION=NOLIMIT  0=> SEE       X
                                        MCDBKDY FOR DAYS TO RETAIN@P1C
MCDAUTBK EQU   B'00010000'              1=AUTO BACKUP ALLOWED, ELSE 0
         DS    CL3                      RESERVED
MCDBKFQ  DS    H                        BACKUP FREQUENCY
MCDBKVS  DS    H                        NUMBER OF BACKUP VERSIONS
MCDBVRD  DS    H                        NUM OF VERSIONS  DS DELETED
MCDBKDY  DS    H                        DAYS TO KEEP BACKUP VERSION
MCDBKNP  DS    H                        DAYS TO KEEP ONLY BACKUP
MCDBADU  DS    AL1                      ALLOW ADMIN OR USER BACKUP SEE X
                                        CONSTANTS BELOW
         DS    CL1                      RESERVED
         DS    CL8                      RESERVED FOR BACKUP DEST CLASS
***********************************************************************
*        MAXIMUM RETENTION CRITERIA -- LIMITS USER SPECIFIABLE        *
*        EXPIRATION DATE AND RETENTION PERIOD  NOLIMIT IF MCDRPNOL IS *
*        ON, ELSE VALUE IN MCDMRTDY                                   *
***********************************************************************
MCDMRET  DS    CL4                      MAXIMUM RETENTION CRITERIA
MCDMRETF DS    CL1                      MAXIMUM RETENTION FLAGS
MCDRPNOL EQU   B'10000000'              RETPD (RETAIN PD) 1=NOLIMIT    X
                                        ELSE SEE MCDMRTDY         @P1C
         DS    CL1                      RESERVED
MCDMRTDY DS    H                        MAXIMUM DAYS TO RETAIN
         DS    CL20                     RESERVED
         DS    CL560                    RESERVED
         DS    0C                       ROUND TO DWORD BOUNDARY
MCDE_LENGTH  EQU *-MCDNMLEN             LENGTH OF ENTRY            +RS
***********************************************************************
*        CONSTANTS FOR MCDRFMT                                        *
***********************************************************************
MCDNULL  EQU   0                        FIELD WAS NOT USED
MCDFDATE EQU   1                        EXPIRE FORMAT  DATE/CREATE
MCDFDAYS EQU   2                        EXPIRE FORMAT  DAYS/CREATE
***********************************************************************
*        CONSTANTS FOR MCDCMAU                                        *
***********************************************************************
MCDMNONE EQU   0                        NO MIGRATION ALLOWED
MCDMCMD  EQU   1                        MIGRATE ON COMMAND ONLY
MCDMBOTH EQU   2                        AUTO MIGRATE OR ON COMMAND
***********************************************************************
*        CONSTANTS FOR MCDBADU                                        *
***********************************************************************
MCDBNONE EQU   0                        NO USER OR ADMIN BACKUP
MCDBADM  EQU   1                        ALLOW ADMIN COMMAND BACKUP
MCDBBOTH EQU   2                        ALLOW ADMIN OR USER COMMAND
***********************************************************************
*        CONSTANTS FOR MCDRELE                                        *
***********************************************************************
MCDRELYE EQU   B'10'                    PARTIAL RELEASE = YES @P2A
MCDRELCN EQU   B'01'                    PARTIAL REL=CONDITIONAL @P2A
MCDRELNO EQU   B'00'                    PARTIAL RELEASE = NO @P2A
***********************************************************************
*        OTHER CONSTANTS                                              *
***********************************************************************
MCDTYP   EQU   7                        CONSTANT LIST TYPE
MCDVER   EQU   0                        CONSTANT MACRO VERSION
*
         MEND
